ninja

Interface Renderable


  • public interface Renderable
    Renderables can be returned inside a result. Renderables are responsible for finalizing the headers before anything is written to the output streams. context.finalizeHeaders(result) is your friend. It is not done automatically as you may want to change the status of the response, the return type and so on...
    Author:
    rbauer
